name: MedicationReview
title: Medication Review
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Describes numerator criteria for STARSC09-HEDISCOAMR Care For Older Adults - Medication Review.),(Data Element Scope: CPT codes for Medication Review.),(Inclusion Criteria: As defined by STARSC09-HEDISCOAMR.),(Exclusion Criteria: As defined by STARSC09-HEDISCOAMR.)

concept.display: Pharmacologic management, including prescription and review of medication, when performed with psychotherapy services (List separately in addition to the code for primary procedure)
Medication therapy management service(s) provided by a pharmacist, individual, face-to-face with patient, with assessment and intervention if provided; initial 15 minutes, new patient
Medication therapy management service(s) provided by a pharmacist, individual, face-to-face with patient, with assessment and intervention if provided; initial 15 minutes, established patient
